title: GPS Model-Based Instructional Design for Enhancing STEM Oral Presentation Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic STEM knowledge and presentation experience
context.additional_context: Vocational training curriculum conducting project-based assessments in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners design logical structures using the GPS model (General-Specific-Concrete structure) in oral presentations on STEM topics
Learners demonstrate communication skills to translate technical content into language understandable by non-experts
Learners improve presentation materials at least three times based on peer feedback and instructor evaluation

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Presentation Tool (e.g., Google Slides Mobile Version)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
